issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
I click on 'Install Android SDK' under Get Started. The plaform installer pops up and show that iOS SDK is already installed. Blackberry and Android are not configured.

h3. Actual Result
After a couple seconds, the system loader starts spinning and never stops. There is no ability to press the configure button, exit, or close the window unless I force quit the application.

h3. Expected Result
I expect to be able to at least cancel out, but cannot.
fields.summary: Studio locks up completely when trying to install Android SDK

comments.body:
Hello, Ian Spangler

Please follow this guides [Link|http://docs.appcelerator.com/titanium/3.0/#!/guide/Installing_the_Android_SDK], for installing and configuring Android SDK. First download the SDK file and then carefully follow the link http://docs.appcelerator.com/titanium/3.0/#!/guide/Installing_the_Android_SDK-section-29004851_InstallingtheAndroidSDK-ConfiguringStudio. 

Hope this helps, Thanks.
